meta.title: Home - Richland School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home district-homepage fsHasTheme2

div.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSlideshow masthead-slideshow fsSlideshowHorizontal fsStatePlaying

figcaption.p: At-Home Learning is Richland School District's comprehensive distance learning program designed to engage students in learning at home while schools are closed in response to the novel coronavirus COVID-19.
Learn about support for students, families and staff while our schools are closed in response to the novel coronavirus COVID-19.

div.p: Explore how we are inspiring and challenging students while providing learning options for the needs of each family.
Student-to-teacher ratio in kindergarten through Grade 3 classrooms.
From our preschool offerings to the new Promise Kindergarten program, our schools are helping students get a good start on their education.
Teachers holding a master's degree or higher.
Our 1:1 Technology Initiative is geared toward preparing students to work in the 21st century.
Middle and high school athletics are just one of the ways we are engaging students and teaching them life skills.
Students named semifinalists for National Merit since 2016.
Our Action Teams For Partnerships (ATPs) build relationships within their communities so students can be fully supported.
Staff members currently holding National Board certification or similar national credentials.

div.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsList fsThumbnailRectangle fsThumbnailFull fsItemCount_4

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-2 fsTag-5 fsTag-10 fsTag-11 fsTag-12 fsTag-13 fsTag-14 fsTag-15 fsTag-20 fsTag-21 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.p: Will your soon-to-be kindergartner be joining our schools in the fall? Enrollment for the 2020-21 school year opens March 1. Learn about the process and how you can start from the comfort of your own home.

article.a: Read More about Register For Kindergarten

div.a: Update On Construction Of Tapteal And Badger Mountain Elementary Schools

div.p: The district will delay the opening of Tapteal Elementary and start of construction for Badger Mountain Elementary due to the novel coronavirus.

article.a: Read More about Update On Construction Of Tapteal And Badger Mountain Elementary Schools

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-2 fsTag-5 fsTag-6 fsTag-7 fsTag-8 fsTag-9 fsTag-10 fsTag-11 fsTag-12 fsTag-13 fsTag-14 fsTag-15 fsTag-16 fsTag-18 fsTag-19 fsTag-20 fsTag-21 fsTag-54 fsTag-55 fsTag-56

div.a: We Are Taking At-Home Learning To The Next Level (UPDATED 4/24/2020)

div.p: Richland School District school buildings may be closed but learning continues! Teachers, school principals and district administrators have updated the district’s At-Home Learning program so students stay engaged in their education through the remainder of the 2019-20 school year while following guidance for social distancing in response to the novel coronavirus.

article.a: Read More about We Are Taking At-Home Learning To The Next Level (UPDATED 4/24/2020)

div.a: Jason Lee Elementary Again Recognized By State

div.p: For the second year in a row, Jason Lee Elementary is being recognized by state education officials for closing achievement gaps and helping students grow and be ready for their futures.

article.a: Read More about Jason Lee Elementary Again Recognized By State

div.a: School Holiday or Snow Make-Up Day

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window
